Also, in some teams we have \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"stream managers,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" who can also help and support with any questions. You can find them in the Delivery central. If you do not have such manager, please come to your Delivery manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":355392,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e3a87e1-e3c8-4e46-8d4c-8e74c09769db/eis3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e3a87e1-e3c8-4e46-8d4c-8e74c09769db/eis3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"eis3.PNG\",\"name\":\"eis3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7e3a87e1-e3c8-4e46-8d4c-8e74c09769db\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":555,\"height\":459},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Step 2: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Join our Teams Channel\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have our internal EPAM channel, where we can ask any questions and have updates and news. We also have a special activity ‚Äì \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meet colleagues\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" üåéüòé. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once a month we introduce one of our employees from the account. Our employees share with us their experience living in different countries and cities, sharing their daily life and some tips and tricks about different locations. Every employee makes video and photo of their home location.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please join this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://teams.microsoft.com/l/team/19%3aO1fF7DnTQd437KRZj7jUuTB2o1U4g7CJFTXdms-0QF01%40thread.tacv2/conversations?groupId=5cb1a5d1-324c-49ce-af81-ecb18d0dfcf8&tenantId=b41b72d0-4e9f-4c26-8a69-f949f367c91d\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"channel\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Step 3: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Townhalls quarterly or by request\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have global townhalls quarterly with EPAM management team of the account. During these meetings we have general updates, and we are introducing news. It is highly recommended to attend for everyone. There is also an option to ask questions during the call or after it. Stay tuned, the invitation will be in advance sent to your
